### 🗓️ Week 10: UI Polish & Animation

**Priority:** 📌 Medium

#### ✅ Tasks:
- [ ] Add subtle transitions to buttons, forms, modals
- [ ] Implement hover/focus/active states
- [ ] Polish UI using Tailwind best practices
- [ ] Add accessibility tags (aria-labels, roles)
